summary: This is an email from Cindy Hopkins transmitting text files and Eclipse files containing her original notes from the December 4, 2009 deposition related to the Epstein case. The email serves as a document transfer communication.

persons.name: Cindy Hopkins
persons.context: She is the sender of an email transmitting text files and Eclipse files containing her original notes from the December 4, 2009 deposition.

events.title: Deposition
events.description: A deposition was conducted on December 4, 2009, related to the Epstein case. Cindy Hopkins' original notes from this deposition are referenced in the email.

keyFacts: Cindy Hopkins transmitted documents related to a December 4, 2009 deposition via email on September 27, 2021.
The transmitted files include text files of Volume 1 and Volume 2 of the deposition, as well as Eclipse files containing Hopkins' original notes.
The email indicates Hopkins was involved in or had access to deposition materials from 2009.
